MAIN_MESSAGE: We apologise that today's pre arranged work affecting your property in the ML11 postcode area of Lanark is still ongoing. This is due to difficult ground conditions on site  and we now expect power to be back on by 5:15pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4:40pm on 27th April 2021.
